body_html: In this PR #5182 we actually set WORLD_SIZE=2 when there is only 2 gpus and 3 otherwise. The end to end test and multigpu tests are fairly important to run so we don't want to skip them in most cases. So we went for reducing WORLD_SIZE and skip the new_group tests (not frequently used) for gloo backends.
